summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing preconstruction activities on the Dr. Jose Rizal Bridge Deck, Magnolia Bridge West Half, and for design and construction of the Arterial Signal Modernization Projects; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1985 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Department; establishing new positions; and making an Engineering Department; establishing new positons; and making an appropriation from the Excess Levy Maintenance and Repair Subfund of the Cumulative Reserve Fund.
